EmailTemplate.name: EM-202307-EMP-BAS-SUMMER-WIN-BACK.Email #1 (Get virtual care that works, and don
EmailTemplate.subject: Get virtual care that works, and don't miss our special offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Learn why employers are taking a fresh look at virtual care Teladoc Health has a long history of helping people measurably improve health outcomes while also controlling costs. That's because we're constantly watching the marketplace and using data insights to build solutions that really work.
We're excited to increase our value even more by offering a new pricing model backed by robust performance guarantees. You’ll have peace of mind knowing we stand behind our long track record of success.
And for a limited time until October 1, we have additional savings for clients who sign up for our solutions again. Simply schedule some time to chat, and we'll tell you all about it. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
